Title: Relates to requiring a written exam upon renewal of a driver's license
Summary: Requires applicant for renewal of a driver's license to pass a written examination with respect to the laws relating to traffic and other matters as the commissioner may prescribe.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring a written exam upon renewal of a driver's license
